content: Welcome, "number one customer"! <style=SizeSmall>Eh? Why are you looking around?</style> I'm talking to you, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>!
info: 商店建成-格连-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Follow me — right here, look! Our newly arranged furniture display window isn't just for show, you can <style=Highlight>buy things straight from it</style>! Super convenient, right?
info: 商店建成-格连-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: The display window gets new items every day! And at the clothing section, you can even <style=Highlight>try things on</style> right there. It's perfect if you want to explore different looks!
info: 商店建成-格连-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: So, here's an opening gift for you! It's a <style=Highlight>paint roller</style>! You can use it to <style=Highlight>decorate outdoor ground surfaces</style>.
info: 商店建成-格连-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: I've got <style=Highlight>pavings</style> that work with the paint roller too. Feel free to take a look, and <style=Highlight>and give the paint roller a go outside!</style>!
info: 商店建成-格连-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: If business picks up, I'll open up even more display windows! Rule Two of "The Business Practitioner's Guide": "Every customer counts."
info: 商店建成-格连-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Lastly, let me express my gratitude once again... Without you, this new shop wouldn't have been able to open. So... <style=SizeBig>Welcome to Glenn's Goods!</style>
info: 商店建成-格连-复杂对话_主流程文本II
